page.title: 12The Howard Family's Day
page.content: {Daddy:}got up. Went to work at RAF W. Raynham on his motorbike. Afternoon: Went to Horning for a sailing race. His team won. Came home. Had dinner. Went to a meeting at my school. Came home to mend his model aeroplane. {Mummy:}got up. Took us to school. Had to go to the doctor's. Went to the launderette because her washing machine is broken. Went shopping. Home for lunch. Afternoon: went to visit a friend. Picked us up from school. Made dinner. Did some gardening. Put us to bed.{Daniel:}went to school. Did work. Got home. Played with his friends. Had dinner. Played again. Lost his first tooth. It went down the plug hole. Left a note for the Tooth Fairy. Went to bed.{Carrie:}read in bed. Dressed. Went to school. Did the pet chart for Domesday. Dinner. Did a collage of a unicorn. Went home. Had tea. T.V. Bed.
